overview: UDUNITS-2 is a library and utility for handling units of physical quantities, offering capabilities for unit conversion and manipulation in scientific applications. It provides a flexible and robust system for managing units and performing conversions in a consistent and reliable manner.
core_features: Unit conversion and manipulation for physical quantities
Support for handling unit consistency and conversions in datasets
Extensive library of predefined units and conversions
Flexible API for integrating unit handling in scientific software
